name: Game Design: d10 Core Roleplaying Game System (Canceled)
blurb: d10 Core is a new roleplaying system focusing on simplified rules, ease of use, and fun. The game has an open design, making it usable in any genre.

rewards.reward: Backer:  You receive project updates and can view the behind-the-scene updates here at Kickstarter!
Supporter:  Same as above, and you will receive a PDF copy of the hardcover core rulebook when completed.

Contributor:  Same as above, and you will receive access to the contributor-only forums of Late Nite Books (http://www.latenitebooks.com), where you can contribute ideas and receive playtesting materials.  If your ideas are used in the final product, a special credit will be given in your name in the book itself!

Benefactor:  Same as above, and a character will be named after you or given a name of your request that is used throughout the rulebook in examples and literature.  You will also receive a signed copy of the "d10 Core Companion" paperback book.

Sponsor:  You will receive a signed hardcover copy of the core rulebook, the PDF version of the hardcover book, and the PDF version of the "d10 Core Companion" book, along with any benefits given to the lower levels (other than the Benefactor character naming reward).

Patron:  Same as Sponsor, but you will also receive two signed copies of the "d10 Core Companion" paperback.  You will also receive a special credit in the book for special thanks in helping to make this project a reality.

The Game Group Pack:  You will receive the same benefits as a Patron, but you will receive a total of 3 signed hardcover books and 5 signed paperback "d10 Core Companion" books.  You also will have the option to have a major character concept developed for you to be added to character creation examples and/or included game settings.  The full-page character sheet and his or her biography and backstory will be included in the published copy.

The Game Master Package:  You receive the same benefits as Patron, but you will receive a total of 5 hardcover copies of the book signed with a special thanks to you by name, 5 paperback copies of the "d10 Core Companion" book signed with a special thanks to you by name, and a PDF copy of every additional game supplement and setting to be released in the future by Late Nite Books for the d10 Core line.

Future Package:  You receive the same benefits as the Game Master Package, but you will also receive signed hardcover copies of every d10 Core supplement ever released in the future.  You will also receive an acknowledgment at the beginning over every d10 Core book released in the future, including the ones described here.
